akn:section.akn:heading: Requirement of national treatment in underwriting government debt instruments

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Designation of certain persons as primary dealers prohibited

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Designation of certain persons as primary dealers prohibited

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Exception for countries having or negotiating bilateral agreements with United States

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Exception for countries having or negotiating bilateral agreements with United States Subsection (b) shall not apply to any person of a foreign country if—

(d) “Person of a foreign country” defined For purposes of this section, a person is a “person of a foreign country” if that person, or any other person which directly or indirectly owns or controls that person, is a resident of that country, is organized under the laws of that country, or has its principal place of business in that country.
(e) Effective date This section shall take effect 12 months after August 23, 1988.
